text:
Located in Israel? F2 Capital, a VC here in Tel Aviv is hiring a content manager. They are an investor in the company that I work for and so I’m just helping them out by sharing the job. If this is interesting for you, please let me know and I will connect you with the right person! (Right now they are only interested in hiring someone locally.)

Job description here: <https://tinyurl.com/ya9ajp7g>

attachments.title: F2 Content Manager
attachments.text: CONTENT MANAGER F2 VENTURE CAPITAL <http://WWW.F2VC.COM|WWW.F2VC.COM> F2 Venture Capital is looking for an experienced and motivated content writer to take a leadership role in developing our position as a trusted destination for early-stage entrepreneurs. S/he will own F2’s content strategy and optimize it for aware...
